sentence.text: In this study, we investigated the anticancer activity of cellular iron ion homeostasis-673451, a potent and selective inhibitor of signal transduction, on NSCLC cell lines (A549 and H358) and the potential mechanism.

Specifically, Nrf2 plays an indispensable role in NSCLC cell sensitivity to platinum-based treatments and we found that combination of cellular iron ion homeostasis-673451 and cisplatin produced a synergistic anticancer effect and substantial ROS production in vitro.
